channel.title: HYDRANS - Rotation [Dubstep, Riddim] :soundcloud:
channel.description:
HYDRANS - Rotation *headphones recommended*
[Click here](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/rotation) [Or here (My SoundCloud)](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans)
![insLP|500x500](upload://bzAcqBi11YhMI9cAMYqzGGc0igt.jpeg) (album art made with canva.com)
Any feedback is appreciated! I worked 3 months on this and i'm really happy how it turned out.
Also, if anyone would be interested in a track deconstruction of any of my songs, let me know.
Thanks for listening! ~ HYDRANS
